Parameters.Name: AppPoolName
Parameters.Label: Application pool name
Parameters.HelpText: The name of the application pool in IIS.

Parameters.Name: AppPoolCheckDelay
Parameters.Label: Status check interval
Parameters.HelpText: The delay, in milliseconds, between each attempt to query the application pool to see if its status is "Stopped"

Parameters.Name: AppPoolCheckRetries
Parameters.Label: Status check retries
Parameters.HelpText: The number of retries before an error is thrown.
